map.starting_village.name: Littlestone
map.starting_village.description: A quaint village known for its hearty folk and picturesque scenery, surrounded by verdant woods and serene streams.
map.starting_village.rooms.village_squar: The bustling heart of Littlestone where villagers gather to trade, gossip, and celebrate. A weathered stone well stands proudly at the center.
A cozy inn with the aroma of freshly baked bread wafting through the air. A perfect place for travelers to rest their weary bones.
map.starting_village.rooms.blacksmith_sh: The clang of hammer on anvil resounds from this sooty structure. Weapons and armor of all kinds line the walls, showcasing the blacksmith's skill.
map.starting_village.rooms.southern_road: A well-worn path leading south out of the village, with the occasional merchant cart traveling to and from distant lands.
map.starting_village.rooms.western_woods: An ancient forest with towering trees and the sounds of mysterious creatures echoing through the underbrush.
map.starting_village.rooms.crossroads.de: An open area with multiple diverging paths indicating directions to various destinations unknown to newcomers.
